name: Buttercup
message: Farm boy, polish my horse's saddle. I want to see my face shining in it by morning.

name: Inigo Montoya
message: Hello. My name is Inigo Montoya. You killed my father. Prepare to die.

name: Miracle Max
message: Turns out your friend here is only MOSTLY dead. See, mostly dead is still slightly alive.

name: Vizzini
message: You've fallen for one of the two classic blunders!

name: Fezzik
message: You've been mostly dead all day.

name: The Clergyman
message: Mawage. Mawage is what bwings us togever today. Mawage that bwessed awangement, that dweam within a dweam.

name: The Albino
message: Escape from the Pit is impossible.

name: Prince Humperdinck
message: Tyron. You know how much I love watching you work, but I've got my country's 500th anniversary to plan, my wedding to arrange, my wife to murder, and Gilda to blame for it. I'm swamped.

name: Valerie
message: I’m not a witch, I’m your wife!

name: Yellin
message: Oh you mean THIS gate key.
